title: Humidor Churrascaria Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Note: This place offers offensive animal based meals but due to lack of options in the area HappyCow is still listing it. Buffet has plenty of vegan options including a variety of veggies & breads and more. Located inside the Graycliff Hotel.
